author: Jennie O'Sullivan
title: Cork hospice 'overwhelmed' by response to iPad appeal
description: Marymount University Hospice in Cork say they are overwhelmed by the response to an appeal last week for iPads and tablets to help patients and their families keep in touch.
content:
Marymount University Hospice in Cork say they are overwhelmed by the response to an appeal last week for iPads and tablets to help patients and their families keep in touch.
The specialist care centre which has 44 palliative care beds as well as 64 elderly r… [+2158 chars]
